content.html: The UK Gov Open Standards Board has been a little quiet for the past couple of years. That's all about to change...I am delighted to have been appointed as co-chair of the new Board, working alongside an amazing group of people. gov.uk/government/gro… #OpenStandards #OpenData
content.value:
The UK Gov Open Standards Board has been a little quiet for the past couple of years. That's all about to change...I am delighted to have been appointed as co-chair of the new Board, working alongside an amazing group of people.
